author: antelder
msg: Add explicit version to compiler plugin to avoid maven warning messages

author: seelmann
msg: Fixed LDAP API integration test issues
o Added LdapApiIntegrationUtils which provides a pooled connections
o Use pooled connections in tests where possible to reduce number of opened sockets
o Use a Suite for all test
o These steps reduced test run from 40s to 20s
o Removed catched exceptions in tests, better show them to see what went wrong
